price: 173. Waxaana ku soo daadinnay roob (dhagxaan naar ah). Xumaa roobka kuwa loo digay.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
